about.description:
I design and develop high-performing emails and conversion-driven websites.
I'm passionate about creating clean, fast, and purposeful experiences.

cards.title: HTML Email Development
cards.description: Professional HTML emails. Clean code structure and layout responsiveness.

cards.title: Email Templates for your CRM
cards.description: Customised HTML email Templates for your email marketing activities. (Salesforce marketing cloud, Veeva, MailChimp)

cards.title: Email Testing
cards.description: Tested based on your scope. Using litmus, email on acid and real devices.

cards.title: Emails Code review
cards.description: Review HTML/CSS code to provide optimization and best practices.

cards.title: Landing Pages
cards.description: Capture leads for your business. Send your subscribers to a dedicated page.

cards.title: Performance Optimization
cards.description: Enhancing website speed and efficiency for maximum user satisfaction.

items.title: Newsletter Email
items.description: Regular updates about your business, products, or content.
items.idealFor: Small businesses, content creators, personal brands
items.includes: Header design, content sections, footer with social links

items.title: Promotional Email
items.description: Special offers, discounts, and limited-time deals.
items.includes: Offer highlights, countdown timer, call-to-action buttons

items.title: Freelancer Portfolio Email
items.description: Professional email template to showcase your work and services.
items.includes: Portfolio preview, services list, testimonial section

items.title: Business Proposal Email
items.description: Professional template for sending quotes and proposals.
items.includes: Service breakdown, pricing table, terms summary

items.title: Personal Event Invitation
items.description: Elegant email templates for weddings, birthdays, and anniversaries.
items.includes: Event details, RSVP button, dress code information

items.title: Follow-up Email
items.description: Friendly template for following up after meetings or initial contacts.
items.includes: Meeting summary, next steps, contact information

items.title: Thank You Email
items.description: Personalized template to thank clients, collaborators, or event attendees.
items.idealFor: Event organizers, business owners, project managers
items.includes: Personal message, future opportunities, social links

items.title: Social Event Page
items.description: Beautiful page for weddings, birthdays, and anniversaries.
items.includes: RSVP form, event schedule, gift registry, location map

items.title: Personal Portfolio
items.description: Minimalist landing page to showcase your work.
items.includes: Work gallery, about section, contact form, skills list

items.title: Local Event
items.description: Promote small festivals, local concerts, or art exhibitions.
items.includes: Ticket sales, event program, interactive map, gallery

items.title: Family Gathering
items.description: Organize family reunions or alumni meetings.
items.idealFor: Family organizers, reunion committees, alumni groups
items.includes: Photo gallery, attendance form, logistics details, updates

items.title: Small Business
items.description: Simple yet effective page for local businesses.
items.idealFor: Restaurants, hair salons, yoga studios, local shops
items.includes: Services menu, booking form, testimonials, business hours

items.title: Project Launch
items.description: Announce your new personal project or venture.
items.includes: Countdown timer, preview gallery, waitlist signup, features

items.title: Digital Resume
items.description: Modern web version of your CV with interactive elements.
items.includes: Skills matrix, work timeline, portfolio section, contact form

items.title: Donation Page
items.description: Raise funds for personal or community causes.
items.includes: Donation form, progress bar, cause description, updates feed
